A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great film with many twists\, and John Williams's score soars in this film. When I first watched Episode VII my reaction was mixed. This film blew me away. The music is much more to the level of the older films (1-6) while 7 was more subtle and I missed the music that has thankfully returned for this installment. Honestly\, the film deserves a higher audience score.
